name: Alluvial
introduce: Alluvial is a enterprise-grade liquid staking protocols allow tokenholders to receive rewards from their staked digital assets while ensuring that their digital assets are freely tradeable and usable in other DeFi applications. Alluvial's first-of-its-kind liquid staking standard addresses the need for KYC/AML requirements for institutions, web3 native enterprises, and other regulated entities to remain in compliance with regulatory obligations.
